titles.title: I Will Sing of My Redeemer (Philip P. Bliss)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will sing of my Redeemer, And His wondrous love to me, On the cruel cross He suffered, From the curse to set me free.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sing, oh sing, of my Redeemer. With His blood He purchased me. On the cross He sealed my pardon, Paid the debt and made me free.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will tell the wondrous story, How my lost estate to save, In His boundless love and mercy He the ransom freely gave.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will sing of my Redeemer And His heav’nly love for me He from death to life hath brought me Son of God, with Him to be.{/lang-eng}
